author: NoiselessVolatileLobster
name: LevelUpTracker
short: Track leveling speeds and audit stagnant users.
description: Tracks how long users take to level up using VertyCo's LevelUp cog, and provides tools to audit, warn, or kick stagnant users.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs, join timestamps, and timestamps of when users reached specific levels for statistical tracking.
